name: Blips and Chitz
desc: Blips and Chits ticket. Can be used to redeem for a cheap stuffed Roy doll.

name: Butter Robot
desc: Has no real purpose, except to pass delicious butter to you.

name: Eyeholes
desc: Eat them in secret so Eyehole man can't find you.

name: Fleeb
desc: Squeeze it and it will secrete Fleeb juice.

name: Mega Seed
desc: Apparently really good for great science, and painful to hide through interdimensional customs.

name: Meseeks Box
desc: Life is pain, let Mr. Meseeks solve some SIMPLE task for you.

name: Ordinary Pickle
desc: Definitely just a regular old pickle, no need for additional questions.

name: Smiggles
desc: So good, you will apparently eat them directly out of a leprechaun's stomach.

name: Plumbus
desc: What's it for? If you have to ask, you shouldn't buy it.
